movie:9e609a81-21db-456b-ba08-796a059eb2.title: Yojimbo
movie:9e609a81-21db-456b-ba08-796a059eb2.overview: A nameless ronin, or samurai with no master, enters a small village in feudal Japan where two rival businessmen are struggling for control of the local gambling trade. Taking the name Sanjuro Kuwabatake, the ronin convinces both silk merchant Tazaemon and sake merchant Tokuemon to hire him as a personal bodyguard, then artfully sets in motion a full-scale gang war between the two ambitious and unscrupulous men.
movie:9e609a81-21db-456b-ba08-796a059eb2.reelgood_synopsis: Yojimbo featuring Toshirō Mifune and Tatsuya Nakadai is streaming with subscription on HBO MAX, streaming with subscription on The Criterion Channel, streaming with subscription on Kanopy, and 2 others. It's an action & adventure and drama movie with a high IMDb audience rating of 8.2 (113,919 votes) and was very well received by critics.

movie:bf69d162-f48b-4c13-a776-63869ab348.title: Sanjuro
movie:bf69d162-f48b-4c13-a776-63869ab348.overview: Toshiro Mifune swaggers and snarls to brilliant comic effect in Kurosawa's tightly paced, beautifully composed "Sanjuro." In this companion piece and sequel to "Yojimbo," jaded samurai Sanjuro helps an idealistic group of young warriors weed out their clan's evil influences, and in the process turns their image of a proper samurai on its ear.
movie:bf69d162-f48b-4c13-a776-63869ab348.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:db8fb97a-09e8-4850-b0f6-a7e0866295.title: Seven Samurai
movie:db8fb97a-09e8-4850-b0f6-a7e0866295.overview: A samurai answers a village's request for protection after he falls on hard times. The town needs protection from bandits, so the samurai gathers six others to help him teach the people how to defend themselves, and the villagers provide the soldiers with food. A giant battle occurs when 40 bandits attack the village.
movie:db8fb97a-09e8-4850-b0f6-a7e0866295.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 5 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 2 others).

movie:e660642b-8ecf-4d22-a98b-21587130cf.title: Rashomon
movie:e660642b-8ecf-4d22-a98b-21587130cf.overview: Brimming with action while incisively examining the nature of truth, "Rashomon" is perhaps the finest film ever to investigate the philosophy of justice. Through an ingenious use of camera and flashbacks, Kurosawa reveals the complexities of human nature as four people recount different versions of the story of a man's murder and the rape of his wife.
movie:e660642b-8ecf-4d22-a98b-21587130cf.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:75039fb7-c89e-40da-8419-f6cd39ded3.title: Ran
movie:75039fb7-c89e-40da-8419-f6cd39ded3.overview: With Ran, legendary director Akira Kurosawa reimagines Shakespeare's King Lear as a singular historical epic set in sixteenth-century Japan. Majestic in scope, the film is Kurosawa's late-life masterpiece, a profound examination of the folly of war and the crumbling of one family under the weight of betrayal, greed, and the insatiable thirst for power.
movie:75039fb7-c89e-40da-8419-f6cd39ded3.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (Prime Video). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 4 services (iTunes, Google Play, Microsoft & 1 other).

movie:0190e403-e57b-416a-a83d-f17704967e.title: Throne of Blood
movie:0190e403-e57b-416a-a83d-f17704967e.overview: Returning to their lord's castle, samurai warriors Washizu and Miki are waylaid by a spirit who predicts their futures. When the first part of the spirit's prophecy comes true, Washizu's scheming wife, Asaji, presses him to speed up the rest of the spirit's prophecy by murdering his lord and usurping his place. Director Akira Kurosawa's resetting of William Shakespeare's "Macbeth" in feudal Japan is one of his most acclaimed films.
movie:0190e403-e57b-416a-a83d-f17704967e.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:cc43a6de-70b0-4821-98be-8982a4384a.title: Samurai Rebellion
movie:cc43a6de-70b0-4821-98be-8982a4384a.overview: Toshiro Mifune stars as Isaburo Sasahara, an aging swordsman living a quiet life until his clan lord orders that his son marry the lord's mistress, who has recently displeased the ruler. Reluctantly, father and son take in the woman, and, to the family’s surprise, the young couple fall in love. But the lord soon reverses his decision and demands the mistress’s return. Against all expectations, Isaburo and his son refuse, risking the destruction of their entire family. Director Masaki Kobayashi's Samurai Rebellion is the gripping story of a peaceful man who finally decides to take a stand against injustice.
movie:cc43a6de-70b0-4821-98be-8982a4384a.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:b4bc3442-5e13-4f36-96b2-0bad530479.title: The Hidden Fortress
movie:b4bc3442-5e13-4f36-96b2-0bad530479.overview: Japanese peasants Matashichi and Tahei try and fail to make a profit from a tribal war. They find a man and woman whom they believe are simple tribe members hiding in a fortress. Although the peasants don't know that Rokurota is a general and Yuki is a princess, the peasants agree to accompany the pair to safety in return for gold. Along the way, the general must prove his expertise in battle while also hiding his identity.
movie:b4bc3442-5e13-4f36-96b2-0bad530479.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:e9b05450-e063-41a9-b838-1d95065740.overview: Kanji Watanabe is a middle-aged man who has worked in the same monotonous bureaucratic position for decades. Learning he has cancer, he starts to look for the meaning of his life.

movie:4ae39ff0-387f-4585-8c5d-71baf56df3.overview: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

movie:2621e24f-1daa-4ca1-be3b-deae511f8f.title: Samurai I: Musashi Miyamoto
movie:2621e24f-1daa-4ca1-be3b-deae511f8f.overview: Struggling to elevate himself from his low caste in 17th century Japan, Miyamoto trains to become a mighty samurai warrior.
movie:2621e24f-1daa-4ca1-be3b-deae511f8f.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:bf3d9e4c-0f0d-4fdd-b7d6-43e624686b.title: Stray Dog
movie:bf3d9e4c-0f0d-4fdd-b7d6-43e624686b.overview: A bad day gets worse for young detective Murakami when a pickpocket steals his gun on a hot, crowded bus. Desperate to right the wrong, he goes undercover, scavenging Tokyo’s sweltering streets for the stray dog whose desperation has led him to a life of crime. With each step, cop and criminal’s lives become more intertwined and the investigation becomes an examination of Murakami’s own dark side.
movie:bf3d9e4c-0f0d-4fdd-b7d6-43e624686b.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:007be5a0-f8b5-4b3d-9402-b48716f61f.title: Harakiri
movie:007be5a0-f8b5-4b3d-9402-b48716f61f.overview: An unusual request for ritual suicide on a feudal lord's property leads to the unwinding of a greater mystery that challenges the clan's integrity.

movie:b733746f-1ecc-4d26-ac36-29510d3fe9.title: Red Beard
movie:b733746f-1ecc-4d26-ac36-29510d3fe9.overview: Aspiring to an easy job as personal physician to a wealthy family, Noboru Yasumoto is disappointed when his first post after medical school takes him to a small country clinic under the gruff doctor Red Beard. Yasumoto rebels in numerous ways, but Red Beard proves a wise and patient teacher. He gradually introduces his student to the unglamorous side of the profession, ultimately assigning him to care for a prostitute rescued from a local brothel.
movie:b733746f-1ecc-4d26-ac36-29510d3fe9.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:e2f9839b-8812-4e16-b04e-537506788a.title: The Bad Sleep Well
movie:e2f9839b-8812-4e16-b04e-537506788a.overview: In this loose adaptation of "Hamlet," illegitimate son Kôichi Nishi climbs to a high position within a Japanese corporation and marries the crippled daughter of company vice president Iwabuchi. At the reception, the wedding cake is a replica of their corporate headquarters, but an aspect of the design reminds the party of the hushed-up death of Nishi's father. It is then that Nishi unleashes his plan to avenge his father's death.
movie:e2f9839b-8812-4e16-b04e-537506788a.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:52b4d5c7-2925-4543-a131-69ea030079.title: Scandal
movie:52b4d5c7-2925-4543-a131-69ea030079.overview: A celebrity photograph sparks a court case as a tabloid magazine spins a scandalous yarn over a painter and a famous singer.
movie:52b4d5c7-2925-4543-a131-69ea030079.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:be537b7d-9209-4de2-a678-a759ae9662.title: The Lower Depths
movie:be537b7d-9209-4de2-a678-a759ae9662.overview: Residents of a rundown boardinghouse in 19th-century Japan, including a mysterious old man and an aging actor, get drawn into a love triangle that turns violent. When amoral thief Sutekichi breaks off his affair with landlady Osugi to romance her younger sister, Okayo, Osugi extracts her revenge by revealing her infidelity to her jealous husband.
movie:be537b7d-9209-4de2-a678-a759ae9662.availability_pros: Available to watch free online (IMDb TV). Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & FilmBox).

movie:03f01fc5-a2e6-40e5-9a99-0f7ba60bb9.title: Kagemusha
movie:03f01fc5-a2e6-40e5-9a99-0f7ba60bb9.overview: Akira Kurosawa's lauded feudal epic presents the tale of a petty thief who is recruited to impersonate Shingen, an aging warlord, in order to avoid attacks by competing clans. When Shingen dies, his generals reluctantly agree to have the impostor take over as the powerful ruler. He soon begins to appreciate life as Shingen, but his commitment to the role is tested when he must lead his troops into battle against the forces of a rival warlord.
movie:03f01fc5-a2e6-40e5-9a99-0f7ba60bb9.availability_pros: Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 5 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 2 others).

movie:26c629ee-a7a7-4f00-ae21-5c7d5d143b.title: Drunken Angel
movie:26c629ee-a7a7-4f00-ae21-5c7d5d143b.overview: The chaotic worlds of the Yakuza and an alcoholic doctor collide in this film noir classic from Akira Kurosawa. Gangster Toshiro Mifune visits doctor Takashi Shimura, after an unfortunate incident with a bullet. The doctor, who despises the Yakuza, discovers the young man is suffering from tuberculosis, a disease symbolic of what is happening to the doctor and the community he serves. Facing his own anger and fear, the doctor aligns himself with the gangster's world.
movie:26c629ee-a7a7-4f00-ae21-5c7d5d143b.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:1d5c4cd3-0e15-48cc-ad40-db5252c503.title: The Sword of Doom
movie:1d5c4cd3-0e15-48cc-ad40-db5252c503.overview: Ryunosuke, a gifted swordsman plying his trade during the turbulent final days of Shogunate rule, has no moral code and kills without remorse. It’s a way of life that leads to madness.
movie:1d5c4cd3-0e15-48cc-ad40-db5252c503.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:7d02139c-2b29-4c54-a458-039be48ce2.title: I Live in Fear
movie:7d02139c-2b29-4c54-a458-039be48ce2.overview: Kiichi Nakajima, an elderly foundry owner convinced that Japan will be affected by an imminent nuclear war, resolves to move his family to safety in Brazil. His family decides to have him ruled incompetent and Dr. Harada, a Domestic Court counselor, attempts to arbitrate.
movie:7d02139c-2b29-4c54-a458-039be48ce2.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:f172d0a5-053d-48be-8886-c958294ef0.title: The Idiot
movie:f172d0a5-053d-48be-8886-c958294ef0.overview: Kameda, who has been in an asylum on Okinawa, travels to Hokkaido. There he becomes involved with two women, Taeko and Ayako. Taeko comes to love Kameda, but is loved in turn by Akama. When Akama realizes that he will never have Taeko, his thoughts turn to murder, and great tragedy ensues.
movie:f172d0a5-053d-48be-8886-c958294ef0.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:339c54e2-977c-4fcd-8fb7-30d4d2073b.title: Dodes'ka-den
movie:339c54e2-977c-4fcd-8fb7-30d4d2073b.overview: By turns tragic and transcendent, Akira Kurosawa’s film follows the daily lives of a group of people barely scraping by in a slum on the outskirts of Tokyo. Yet as desperate as their circumstances are, each of them—the homeless father and son envisioning their dream house; the young woman abused by her uncle; the boy who imagines himself a trolley conductor—finds reasons to carry on. The unforgettable Dodes’ka-den was made at a tumultuous moment in Kurosawa’s life. And all of his hopes, fears, and artistic passion are on fervent display in this, his gloriously shot first color film.
movie:339c54e2-977c-4fcd-8fb7-30d4d2073b.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:04fa3fc9-f70b-43be-9b14-bf38c630f0.title: Lady Snowblood
movie:04fa3fc9-f70b-43be-9b14-bf38c630f0.overview: Yuki's family is nearly wiped out before she is born due to the machinations of a band of criminals. These criminals kidnap and brutalize her mother but leave her alive. Later her mother ends up in prison with only revenge to keep her alive. She creates an instrument for this revenge by purposefully getting pregnant. Yuki never knows the love of a family but only killing and revenge.
movie:04fa3fc9-f70b-43be-9b14-bf38c630f0.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX & The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 3 services (iTunes, Google Play & Prime Video).

movie:20076a58-6a0a-49fc-99e6-a3db671067.overview: Yoshitsune Minamoto, disguised with his retinue as monks, must make do with a comical porter as their guide through hostile territory en route to safety.

movie:835e8eff-3b1d-49db-86ec-9de05784f9.title: Madadayo
movie:835e8eff-3b1d-49db-86ec-9de05784f9.overview: This film tells the story of professor Uehida Hyakken-sama (1889-1971), in Gotemba, around the forties. He was a university professor until an air raid, when he left to become a writer and has to live in a hut. His mood has hardly changed, not by the change nor by time.

movie:09f47354-7067-4e32-a8c6-6494d4f07e.title: One Wonderful Sunday
movie:09f47354-7067-4e32-a8c6-6494d4f07e.overview: Yuzo and his fiancée Masako spend their Sunday afternoon together, trying to have a good time on just thirty-five yen. They manage to have many small adventures, especially because Masako's optimism and belief in dreams is able to lift Yuzo from his realistic despair.
movie:09f47354-7067-4e32-a8c6-6494d4f07e.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:24bb0a73-597a-4afc-b2ba-59a1d3a369.overview: A bravado period action film set at the end of Japan's feudal era in which a group of unemployed samurai are enlisted to bring down a sadistic lord and prevent him from ascending to the throne and plunging the country into a war-torn future.

movie:ae6de831-abc3-4bd5-aa56-1f99b495cc.title: Sisters of the Gion
movie:ae6de831-abc3-4bd5-aa56-1f99b495cc.overview: Umekichi, a geisha in the Gion district of Kyoto, feels obliged to help her lover Furusawa when he asks to stay with her after becoming bankrupt and leaving his wife. However her younger sister Omocha tells her she is wasting her time and money on a loser. She thinks that they should both find wealthy patrons to support them. Omocha therefore tries various schemes to get rid of Furusawa, and set themselves up with better patrons.
movie:ae6de831-abc3-4bd5-aa56-1f99b495cc.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:d79fd869-30bf-49eb-9d40-91f99fc561.title: No Regrets for Our Youth
movie:d79fd869-30bf-49eb-9d40-91f99fc561.overview: Yukie, the well-bred daughter of a university professor, is shocked when her father is relieved of his post for his political teachings during a purge of anti-militarism in pre-war Kyoto. Years go by as she is courted by two of her father's former students; one a fiery leftist, the other more moderate and equable.
movie:d79fd869-30bf-49eb-9d40-91f99fc561.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:d8b4d09b-07c5-4b08-b74c-6b204796c6.title: Dersu Uzala
movie:d8b4d09b-07c5-4b08-b74c-6b204796c6.overview: A military explorer meets and befriends a Goldi man in Russia’s unmapped forests. A deep and abiding bond evolves between the two men, one civilized in the usual sense, the other at home in the glacial Siberian woods.
movie:d8b4d09b-07c5-4b08-b74c-6b204796c6.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:c54c7e70-7473-40f2-b183-18da3c8ae7.title: Zatoichi
movie:c54c7e70-7473-40f2-b183-18da3c8ae7.overview: Zatoichi is a 19th century blind nomad who makes his living as a gambler and masseur. However, behind this humble facade, he is a master swordsman gifted with a lightning-fast draw and breathtaking precision. While wandering, Zatoichi discovers a remote mountain village at the mercy of Ginzo, a ruthless gang-leader. Ginzo disposes of anyone who gets in his way, especially after hiring the mighty samurai ronin, Hattori, as a bodyguard. After a raucous night of gambling in town, Zatoichi encounters a pair of geishas--as dangerous as they are beautiful--who've come to avenge their parents' murder. As the paths of these and other colorful characters intertwine, Ginzo's henchmen are soon after Zatoichi. With his legendary cane sword at his side, the stage is set for a riveting showdown.
movie:c54c7e70-7473-40f2-b183-18da3c8ae7.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (Paramount+). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 4 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 1 other).

movie:346cbfda-d870-47e0-857a-b6cb8f0f63.title: Tokyo Story
movie:346cbfda-d870-47e0-857a-b6cb8f0f63.overview: The elderly Shukishi and his wife, Tomi, take the long journey from their small seaside village to visit their adult children in Tokyo. Their elder son, Koichi, a doctor, and their daughter, Shige, a hairdresser, don't have much time to spend with their aged parents, and so it falls to Noriko, the widow of their younger son who was killed in the war, to keep her in-laws company.
movie:346cbfda-d870-47e0-857a-b6cb8f0f63.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 5 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 2 others).

movie:155397ec-40dd-4484-b382-e27448b950.title: When a Woman Ascends the Stairs
movie:155397ec-40dd-4484-b382-e27448b950.overview: Keiko, whom everyone calls Mama, narrates her story: she's a hostess on the Ginza, 30, a widow. She describes life's vicious cycle: acting cheerful around drunks, dressing and living well to convey confidence, needing money for these expenses and for her demanding mother and brother, and knowing she's growing older. She's of an age when she must choose: to seek marriage (difficult given her tarnished occupation), to be a kept woman, or to borrow money to buy a bar of her own. Each route has dangers, including investors demanding a return on their loans. Keiko has a quiet dignity that attracts men, but are they what they seem? Does she actually have choices?
movie:155397ec-40dd-4484-b382-e27448b950.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:b61f4059-6248-4a40-901b-8b01d97351.overview: His ideals challenged by life as a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist faces ever greater tests in his fight for survival.

movie:aaa7d778-0d37-4dc8-bbe6-bfbfcffbf4.overview: Outlaw Jesse James is rumored to be the 'fastest gun in the West'.
